title: Flutter Basics
description: Master the fundamentals of Flutter development. Learn to build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. This comprehensive course covers widgets, state management, navigation, and more.

title: Advanced Dart Programming
description: Take your Dart programming skills to the next level. Deep dive into advanced concepts including asynchronous programming, generics, mixins, and best practices for large-scale applications.

title: UI/UX Design Mastery
description: Learn to create stunning user interfaces and exceptional user experiences. This course combines design theory with practical implementation in Flutter, covering Material Design, custom themes, animations, and responsive layouts.

title: State Management in Flutter
description: Master different state management solutions in Flutter. Compare and implement Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, and GetX. Learn when to use each solution and how to architect large applications effectively.
